episodes.title: Actor and comedian Russell Brand charged with rape and sexual assault
episodes.description:
Russell Brand has been charged with rape and two counts of sexual assault between 1999 and 2005.

The Metropolitan Police say the comedian, 50, has also been charged with one count of oral rape and one count of indecent assault.

Police have said Brand is accused of raping a woman in the Bournemouth area in 1999 and indecently assaulting a woman in the Westminster area of London in 2001.

Read more: https://news.sky.com/story/russell-brand-charged-with-rape-and-sexual-assault-13341771

episodes.title: The children's home run by a 'cult-like' group of teachers | The UK Tonight with Sarah-Jane Mee
episodes.description:
The UK Tonight with Sarah-Jane Mee will dig into the issues people across the country are talking about and explain and analyse the news stories they need to know in a dynamic hour of domestic news. 
 
Tonight,

🔴 More than 40 people who were sent to The Red House, a now defunct children’s home in remote Norfolk, say they were physically, sexually and psychologically abused there

🔴 Newly obtained video footage reveals the moment container ship Solong crashed into US oil tanker Stena Immaculate off the coast of East Yorkshire on Monday morning.

🔴 The Hertfordshire village hounded by a Harris Hawk. We'll speak to one of a number of residents who have attacked by a vicious bird of prey in the last 2 weeks
 
Tap the 'Notify me' bell button to be reminded when the show goes live and make sure you don't miss anything ⬆️ 
 
UK Tonight | https://trib.al/I0lsYCE

episodes.title: The Danish group behind a children's home run like a cult
episodes.description:
The Red House was a children’s home in Norfolk which took in hundreds of students in care from across the UK between 1984 and 1998.   

It was run by a controversial Danish group called Tvind, operating an unconventional education system - most students from the Red House left without any qualifications. Now, over 40 former pupils have come forward with allegations of physical and sexual abuse they say they faced at the home.   

On the Sky News Daily, Niall Paterson speaks to correspondent Alice Porter about what has been uncovered, as she travelled to Denmark to track down the organisation behind the Red House and investigate claims it is a cult. And we hear from victims about the alleged abuse faced by students. 
 
Producer: Soila Apparicio 
Editor: Philly Beaumont

episodes.title: Sky News Investigates: The children's home run by a cult-like group of teachers
episodes.description:
A warning this report contains references to sexual assault and suicide

More than 40 people who were sent to The Red House, a now defunct children’s home in remote Norfolk, say they were physically, sexually and psychologically abused there.

Former students report a toxic culture of public shaming, with staff acting as violent ringleaders. 

Sky's Alice Porter travelled to Denmark to find out more about the radical Danish group which ran the school.

Anyone feeling emotionally distressed or suicidal can call Samaritans for help on 116 123 or email jo@samaritans.org in the UK. In the US, call the Samaritans branch in your area or 1 (800) 273-TALK

episodes.title: Neo-Nazi satanist jailed for encouraging suicide online and possessing terror material
episodes.description:
A teenage Neo-Nazi satanist who was caught with terrorism material and encouraged suicide online has been jailed for six years.

Cameron Finnigan, 19, from West Sussex, joined a satanic extremist group in late 2023 and told one girl to kill herself "for me" on video so he could share it in the group's online chat, the Old Bailey heard.

He also admitted to having indecent images of a child and two counts of criminal damage.

Anyone feeling emotionally distressed or suicidal can call Samaritans for help on 116 123 or email jo@samaritans.org in the UK. In the US, call the Samaritans branch in your area or 1 (800) 273-TALK.

Read more: https://news.sky.com/story/neo-nazi-satanist-cameron-finnigan-jailed-for-encouraging-suicide-online-and-possessing-terror-material-13289400

episodes.title: Teenager sentenced at the Old Bailey for possessing terror material - Watch in full
episodes.description:
A teenage Neo-Nazi satanist who was caught with terrorism material and encouraged suicide online has been jailed for six years.

Cameron Finnigan, 19, from Horsham, West Sussex, joined a satanic extremist group in late 2023 and told one girl to kill herself "for me" on video so he could share it in the group's online chat, the Old Bailey heard.

Anyone feeling emotionally distressed or suicidal can call Samaritans for help on 116 123 or email jo@samaritans.org in the UK. In the US, call the Samaritans branch in your area or 1 (800) 273-TALK.

episodes.title: Cult members sentenced for plotting to abduct a coroner in Essex
episodes.description:
Four members of a group who plotted to kidnap a coroner have been jailed.

Mark Christopher, 59 and Matthew Martin, 47, both from east London, along with married couple Shiza Harper, 45, and Sean Harper, 38, both from South Benfleet, Essex were convicted of conspiracy to kidnap and conspiracy to commit false imprisonment in July

Read more on this story: https://news.sky.com/story/cult-members-who-wanted-to-construct-own-legal-system-jailed-for-coroner-kidnap-plot-13241163

episodes.title: Daughter of Aravindan Balakrishnan: "He Was A Psychopath"
episodes.description:
"He was a psycopath". In a Sky News special report, Katy Morgan-Davies, who spent three decades as the captive of her father and cult leader Aravindan Balakrishnan's, has described him as a narcissist who loves violence.
